snippet: Amber and Robert Field wanted to buy a place with an elevator, as well as ample closet space and two bathrooms.
abstract: The Hunt column on the search by Amber and Robert Field for a larger apartment in Manhattan; couple found a two-bedroom in a building on West 145th Street for $389,000.
lead_paragraph: Amber and Robert Field wanted to buy a place with an elevator, as well as ample closet space and two bathrooms.

headline.seo: The Hunt - A Larger Place (Couch Must Fit)
